items.title: Former NBA star Zach Randolph sells L.A. trophy estate for $7.4 million, after several price cuts
items.description: Retired Grizzlies star Zach Randolph has finally offloaded his sprawling L.A. home for $7.4 million—11 months after listing it for $8.5 million.

items.title: Taylor Swift’s last record made up more than 6% of all album sales in 2024. Will ‘The Life of a Showgirl’ do even better?
items.description: Sales of Swift’s albums drive the fortunes of the entire music industry, as her catalog continues to dominate streaming lists all over the world.
